page.title: 02FARMS
page.content: Most farms worked by owner and average,one other person.Very few are 'managed'. Mainly mixed farming_average size of farms being 150 acres of land is gently undulating and fertile.Soil mainly clay is reasonably easy to cultivate . Most farms are partly or completely drained. Use of fertilisers range from two to five times a year. Popular ones are nitrogen and compound .Crops are barley,wheat and oats. Freisian herds are kept for milk and beef. Sheep breeds are suffolk,suffolk cross mashams and 50% of farmers own at least one bull.Animals are fed on hay, cake,cereals,beet,mangolds,sileage and grass_most of them produced on the farm.
